cryptod.prng.blumblumshub

Authors:
Andrey A. Popov, andrey.anat.popov@gmail.com

enum BIT_TYPE;
The type of bit output to use.

class BlumBlumShub: cryptod.prng.prng.PRNG;
The BlumBlumShub Pseudo random number generator.

this();
Sets p to rfc2412p1536, q to rfc5114p2048 and the initial seed to rfc2412p768.

this(BigInt p, BigInt q, BigInt seed);
Takes two BigInt prime numbers, p and q as input such that p = q = 3 mod 4 and takes a BigInt initial seed.

void setBitType(BIT_TYPE T);
Sets the bit type to use. BIT_TYPE.ODD is the odd bit parity BIT_TYPE.EVEN is the even bit parity BIT_TYPE.LEAST is the least significant bit and is default. NOT IMPLEMENTED YET.

uint getNextInt();
Gets the next integer from the computation (note: each integer needs to run 32 rounds of the function making it exteremly computationaly expensive.)
